Member Data Documentation

AbstractBody* _body [protected]

Which body segment.

SimTK::Vec3 _torque [protected]

Torque to be applied.

VectorFunction* _torqueFunction [protected]

Vector function containing torque to be applied (t,x,y,z).

bool _inputTorquesInGlobalFrame [protected]

Flag to set reference frame of input torque.

bool _recordAppliedLoads [protected]

Flag to indicate whether or not to record the loads that are applied during an integration.

Recording these loads takes a lot of memory as they are stored every time the derivatives are evaluated (e.g., 6 times per integration step).

Storage* _appliedTorqueStore [protected]

Storage for the torque that was actually applied during the simulation.
